name: Quantum Soup
description:
Thoughts have a frequency, and as we think them, they come back to us.

This game portraits that in a way where a girl was stuck inside the negative thoughts of her head, and to get out of them, she is required to jump over the frequency  waves in the game.

*This game includes psychedelic music.

 ___________________________________

This game is a short game, that will be expanded or worked on in the future. It was made for GameX  40 hours game jam, with the theme "Frequency".

Please leave a comment with recommendations for a future version. Thank you.
